scripts.deploy:dev: firebase use hosheee-dev && firebase deploy --only firestore:rules,firestore:indexes,storage
scripts.deploy:prod: firebase use hosheee && firebase deploy --only firestore:rules,firestore:indexes,storage
scripts.deploy-site:dev: firebase use hosheee-dev && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy-site:prod: firebase use hosheee && firebase deploy --only hosting
